name: Blurr Creative
description:
Blurr Creative is here to service clients better and give them the advantage when it comes to the internet by providing a fully fledged design studio that compliments inbound marketing to generate leads for your recruitment and IT MSP business. Our approach is with a “get things done” attitude with transparency built in.
Started as an idea in 2015 the company has grown to a team of 8 and this is only the beginning our passion and experience in the recruitment and IT MSP market comes from years of working with industry leaders and sharing the experience within our team. Blurr Creative is the marketing arm of your business that is affordable, experienced and we like to think give a refreshing take on marketing as a whole.
